name: D8 NITE - a dead girl's dressup dilemma
name_original: D8 NITE - a dead girl's dressup dilemma
description:
It's Vivian Lively's 3 year anniversary with her girlfriend. But what should she wear? This is... D8 NITE - a dead girl's dress up dilemma!

There are nearly 70 different articles of clothing you can mix and match! There are a few very small ending text variations depending on certain clothing combinations, to add a bit more flavour.  Not all clothes overlay the most elegantly, but I hope you still have fun none the less.

If you want to show me the outfits you came up with, or have any suggestions for things you'd like to see in the game...
Tweet them at me, I'm @adoxtalks!

CREDITS

Game by Adoxographist
Dressup Script by Leon

Music
Lazy Sunday by Uncanny
(http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Uncanny/4Songs/Uncanny_-03-_Lazy_Sunday) under CC by 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
